title: Patch Notes 8.7, Cho'Gath and aura items
body:
In the patch notes of patch 8.7 was mentioned that the aura of some items (e.g. Abyssal Mask) will increase with Cho'Gath's size. Well, while I was playing my first game after 8.7, I felt something was off. 

A friend and I did some investigation on this and found out that none of the aura items have their auras increased according to his size. As a result, his auto-attack range at max size (which is 200) is still further than the aura radius (which is about 175). Even with Lulu's ult the aura radius still remains the same.

Maybe this change has intentionally not been implemented yet, so maybe a Rioter can clarify this for me?
Thank you in advance.

replies.body: That seems quite odd. I'll look into it, thanks for the report!
Wouldn't it be easier to slightly buff the aura ranges to 225 or something to make is slightly over the max melee auto range?
Even then that makes it not really work on the biggest champions.   And the very champions who WANT most aura items are the champs who get the biggest, Cho, Zac, Naut, Sion, ect.

In that case make it extent 25 outside of their auto range, I guess would be the next possible solution (of course this effect being a melee specific one, don't want to see ranged champs strolling around with massive auras).

The problem there is a full sized Cho and a level 1 Cho are both coded to have the same auto range, just with different hit boxes. That means that maxed Cho has a hitbox bigger than his auto range. In other words, 250 hit box, 125 autos, 150 burn range on 250 hit box, I believe is how that would work out. Spaghetti.

i did report it through the Report A Bug link in the client, but I wasn’t really sure if actually was a bug so I decided to post it here. Thank you very much.

I didn't feel like the special exclusion of frozen heart from the aura changes was necessary.

Even auto attacks are determined by the outside of your character model. You can actually use the elixir of iron, get larger, and your auto attack area increases. Although you are also more hit-able by incoming autos and skillshots in return.

Maybe large auras Should be a special Cho'gath quirk. Frozen heart is a very ideal item on him. Such synergy should be celebrated. It adds a special appreciation to Cho'Gath-ness
